useCase.name: Add New Edge Agent
useCase.description: Alice adds a new Edge Agent following the provided instructions.

preconditions.precondition: Alice has chosen "existing" or "add new device" option in Edge Agent Start.
Edge Agent 2 has been provisioned as described in the Provision New Agent diagram.

successEndConditions.condition: Agent 2 successfully added and authorized with selected authorizations.

useCase.trigger: Alice triggers the process by selecting to add a new agent.

mainSequence.step: Edge Agent 2 provides instructions to Alice for adding the agent and selecting authorizations.
Alice adds agent with the selected authorizations.
Edge Agent 1 displays a provision code for adding Agent 2.
Alice shows the code to Agent 2.
Agent 2 sends add request and necessary data to Agent 1.
Agent 1 stores data in the wallet.
Alice confirms the addition of Agent 2.
Agent 1 adds keys and authorizations for Agent 2 to the policy registry.
Data and token sync between Agent 1 and Agent 2.
Agent 2 stores the data in the wallet.
